25,
2007

SENT VIA EMAIL AND REGISTED MAIL

 

 

RE: Copyright / Trademark Infringement Notice - DMCA takedown immediately


Domain Name:   e-loanweb.com
Registrar:    Spot Domain LLC 


Name Servers: 
      ns151.ehostpros.com 
      ns152.ehostpros.com 

REGISTRANT CONTACT INFO 
E-loanweb.com 
Kathy Yates 
2415 East Camelback Road Suite 700 PMB#131 
Phoenix 
AZ 85016 

Server Data

67.15.94.77 

IP Location:

- Texas - Houston - Everyones Internet 

Reverse DNS

svr76.ehostpros.com

 

Dear The Planet.com D/B/A ehostpros,

Loan Alliance Inc. has recently discovered that the operator(s) of
http://www.e-loanweb.com (the "Website") IS ONCE AGAIN blatantly violating our web
property www.imortgagecentral.com intellectual property rights. Loan Alliance Inc.
provides this notification of infringement pursuant to the Digital Millennium
Copyright Act (the "DMCA"). The Website violates www.imortgagecentral.com
<http://www.imortgagecentral.com/>  rights in several different ways:

1) Your clients copying and distribution of the ENTIRE Website listed at
e-loanweb.com , or any part of the Website, is copyright infringement against our
web property badcreditalliance.com under United States Copyright law.  As we are
sure you are aware, Federal law, specifically Section 106 of the Copyright Act (17
U.S.C.
